nodes.text: Thomas Graham Smith (born c. 1938) was ILM's general manager for Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, as well as the producer for Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure and Ewoks: The Battle for Endor. Smith was also the author of the coffee-table book Industrial Light and Magic: The Art of Special Effects and has contributed to biographical articles about his fellow ILM employees for Star Wars Insider.
